short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dive into the Yami Kawaii aesthetic with soft purple and blue hues, complete with a sweet twist.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Immerse yourself in the whimsical charm of Yami Kawaii with a captivating theme of pastel hues!

🎨 Minimalist Design: A visually delightful theme featuring Yami Kawaii’s signature mix of purple and blue tones, with a candy prop adding a playful touch.
⏰ Clock and Date: Keep track of time with a cute and stylish display that complements the Yami Kawaii aesthetic.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Effortlessly navigate to your favorite websites with a touch of kawaii flair.
🎮 Play Games: Explore mini-games that match the fun and quirky spirit of Yami Kawaii.
🔍 Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with your preferred engine.
🚀 More Extensions: Elevate your browsing with features as unique and adorable as the Yami Kawaii style.
